languages.text: "C Кибеллой нас связывают узы сильнее простых человеческих чувств. Пусть сейчас она сбилась с пути и не может предстать передо мной — я дождусь. Стану ее светом".

traits.locale_text: "C Кибеллой нас связывают узы сильнее простых человеческих чувств. Пусть сейчас она сбилась с пути и не может предстать передо мной — я дождусь. Стану ее светом".

languages.text: "The bond between Kibellah and me is stronger than that of simple emotion. And although she may have lost her way and cannot appear before me right now, I will wait for her. I will become her light."
languages.original_text: "C Кибеллой нас связывают узы сильнее простых человеческих чувств. Пусть сейчас она сбилась с пути и не может предстать передо мной — я дождусь. Стану ее светом".

traits.locale_text: "The bond between Kibellah and I is stronger than that of simple emotion. And though she has lost her way and cannot appear before me right now, I will wait for her. I will become her light."
"The bond between Kibellah and I is stronger than that of simple emotion. And though she has lost her way and cannot appear before me right now, I will wait for her. I will become her light."

"The bond between Kibellah and me is stronger than that of simple emotion. And although she may have lost her way and cannot appear before me right now, I will wait for her. I will become her light."

"The bond between Kibellah and me is stronger than that of simple emotion. And although she may have lost her way and cannot appear before me right now, I will wait for her. I will become her light."

languages.text: "Das Band zwischen Kibellah und mir ist stärker als eine simple Emotion. Und obwohl sie von ihrem Weg abgekommen sein mag und sich mir im Moment nicht zeigen kann, werde ich auf sie warten Ich werde ihr Licht sein."
languages.original_text: "The bond between Kibellah and me is stronger than that of simple emotion. And although she may have lost her way and cannot appear before me right now, I will wait for her. I will become her light."

traits.locale_text: "Das Band zwischen Kibellah und mir ist stärker als eine simple Emotion. Und obwohl sie von ihrem Weg abgekommen sein mag und sich mir im Moment nicht zeigen kann, werde ich auf sie warten Ich werde ihr Licht sein."

languages.text: « Le lien qui m'unit à Kibella est plus fort que celui des simples émotions et bien qu'elle se soit perdue et ne puisse pas venir me trouver, je l'attendrai. Je serai son phare dans la nuit. »
languages.original_text: "The bond between Kibellah and me is stronger than that of simple emotion. And although she may have lost her way and cannot appear before me right now, I will wait for her. I will become her light."

traits.locale_text: « Le lien qui m'unit à Kibella est plus fort que celui des simples émotions et bien qu'elle se soit perdue et ne puisse pas venir me trouver, je l'attendrai. Je serai son phare dans la nuit. »

languages.text: «El vínculo que me une con Kibellah es más fuerte que el de la mera emoción. Aunque haya perdido su camino y no pueda presentarse ante mí ahora, esperaré su regreso. Me convertiré en su luz».
languages.original_text: "The bond between Kibellah and me is stronger than that of simple emotion. And although she may have lost her way and cannot appear before me right now, I will wait for her. I will become her light."

traits.locale_text: «El vínculo que me une con Kibellah es más fuerte que el de la mera emoción. Aunque haya perdido su camino y no pueda presentarse ante mí ahora, esperaré su regreso. Me convertiré en su luz».

languages.text: 「{mf|俺|私}とキベラの絆は、単なる感情を超えたものだ。そして、彼女が道を失い、今は{mf|俺|私}の前に現れることができないのだとしても、{mf|俺|私}は待つ。{mf|俺|私}が彼女の光となるのだ」
languages.original_text: "The bond between Kibellah and me is stronger than that of simple emotion. And although she may have lost her way and cannot appear before me right now, I will wait for her. I will become her light."

traits.locale_text: 「{mf|俺|私}とキベラの絆は、単なる感情を超えたものだ。そして、彼女が道を失い、今は{mf|俺|私}の前に現れることができないのだとしても、{mf|俺|私}は待つ。{mf|俺|私}が彼女の光となるのだ」

languages.text: “我与绮贝菈之间的纽带比单纯的感情更加牢固。尽管她可能迷失了方向，现在无法出现在我面前，但我愿意等待她。我会成为她生命中的明光。”
languages.original_text: "The bond between Kibellah and me is stronger than that of simple emotion. And although she may have lost her way and cannot appear before me right now, I will wait for her. I will become her light."

traits.locale_text: “我与绮贝菈之间的纽带比单纯的感情更加牢固。尽管她可能迷失了方向，现在无法出现在我面前，但我愿意等待她。我会成为她生命中的明光。”

languages.text: "Kibellah ile aramdaki bağ, sıradan bir duygudan çok daha güçlü. Yolundan sapmış ve huzuruma çıkamıyor olsa da onu bekleyeceğim. Ona ışık olacağım."
languages.original_text: "The bond between Kibellah and me is stronger than that of simple emotion. And although she may have lost her way and cannot appear before me right now, I will wait for her. I will become her light."
